website_summaries.verdict: Men of advanced age and those with impaired motor function are quite happy with the Viator Strap. The outsole is designed to be flexible for a smooth heel-to-toe transition. The sole unit also reduces the shock felt by the foot. To top it off, the wide strap is easy to operate. This Propet walking shoe also comes recommended by those who need room for custom inserts or braces.
pros: Almost all of the reviewers describe the Propet Viator Strap as one of the most comfortable trainers they have ever owned
A majority of the purchasers enjoy how quickly they can get this footwear on and off
Many owners appreciate that it accommodates the use of foot braces and custom orthotics
A lot of users claim that this product did not aggravate their existing foot, joint, and back issues
Plenty of folks are satisfied with the fit
A good number of shoppers like how light this pair of all-day wear walking shoes is
For a Velcro footwear, a bunch of buyers deem it quite attractive
cons: According to a few people, the strap made it hard to get a secure lockdown

customer_reviews.title: Success!  Comfort, Style, Fit
customer_reviews.text: It has been stands and walks so much at work all day- his step count normally is 20,000 steps. Lately he’s been complaining a lot of back pain and especially-his feet hurting. I said - you need some new shoes! I purchased these and he absolutely loves them. His feet feel much better as does his back. Additionally, he’s gotten many compliments at work about these new shoes, they are sporty & sleek- he says they’re incredibly comfortable and loves them! Fit is perfect- size runs normally.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: My feet are problem feet and this is one of the best shoes I have had in a long, long time. They fit my wide foot (3E) perfectly, are easy to get on and off, and are about as comfortable a walking shoe as you will find. It's almost like wearing house slippers on my walks with the dog.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mularz

customer_reviews.title: Fit and function.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well and look nice. They are listed as a sneaker, but would double nicely for a relaxed evening out casual shoe. They truly are an extra wide (5E width) fit shoe, which I require.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To loose fit and No support.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe for diabetic support & adjustability to stop foot sliding forward and toes hitting the end of shoe. This shoe and the velcro closure did Not perform as I had wished. Was in hospital when arrived and didn't get to try them on but one time. I missed the return time because of hospital stay. I am 80 years old and would like to get my money back because I really need it. Can you make an exception to return the shoes. Original packaging & box.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Runner

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and is very soft and supportive. You can wear them all day long, super comfortable. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Josepe

customer_reviews.title: Great for elders.
customer_reviews.text: My 83 year old father loves them. They are light and comfortable. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 90 yo father who can no longer easily tie shoelaces. He also wears orthotic inserts. They fit perfectly and he loves to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Lotsopets

customer_reviews.title: nice looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and nice looking sneaker. The Velcro closure looks nice, and is very functional
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: Two quick and easy to be thrown to the back of the closet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a little bit difficult to get the exact tightness but that’s a user problem not a structural problem. They are so simple for my husband they are his “go to “shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Too good.
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove, feels like I'm wearing slippers. The price was just too good to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: He loves these!
customer_reviews.text: About the only velcro closure shoe we found and super glad we did. Comfortable. Easy. Looks great w/ jeans. Ordering another color.
customer_reviews.author: JulS

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 88-year-old father. They're lightweight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair that I bought for my husband. He loves the lightweight of the shoe and the ease in getting them on.
customer_reviews.author: BUDDYS MOM

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a relative with major foot issues. He loves them - comfortable and flexible. Sturdy without feeling heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: IMMEDIATELY!!!!!! Don't buyanything from amazon they have gone to hell and karma is a boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Te Velcro strap started to shread/tear after 2 months of purchasing like everything else at Amazon CHEAP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sojak

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lacks a bit in support but otherwise a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: zinken

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are well made and true to description
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband. He is a stroke victim, and these shoes were a perfect fit. He loves them and so do I. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO GET ON AND OFF.
customer_reviews.text: LIKED THE FLAT SOLE WHICH WORKS BETTER FOR SOMEONE WITH HIP SURGERY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Show the top of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: When showing a picture of the top of the shoe it would be helpful if you could show how much the shoe stretches with the tongue of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Minner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wear. Put on and take off. And look nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Inkpen

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes fit well.
customer_reviews.text: It fits as expected I probably could have ordered a half size smaller but that's okay. I like these cuz they don't have the lugs on the bottom like most of the sneakers which has caused me to fall in the past. The place where I bought my brace was trying to charge $150 for the same shoe.
customer_reviews.author: moandmoed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a stroke and he needed a shoe he could manage alone and use for rehab. He says often that these shoes are perfect but they are a tiny bit tight with heavier exercise socks.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for some shoes with velcro that didn't look so "old". After reading the reviews, I thought these might work for him. However, the minute he put them on, he said they had absolutely no support. We are returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Whittington

customer_reviews.title: PAID $27.64 NOT WORTH $1. ASIAN MADE FOR VERY TINY FEET. NO ARCH FLAT. PAINFUL. G-A-R-B-A-G-E
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT made in the USA, but made in a country that has much smaller feet, CHINA. I ordered 13EEE but they fit like 12C. Has an very tight elastic strap that's under the vinyl adjustable strap, so the fake adjustable strap is worthless. No arch support, absolutely flat, painful. Doubt that they are true rubber soles as claimed, but likely EVA that will compress and go flat in no time. For the $27.64 (Amazon verifiable) that I paid for the pair, I have given them to charity. DEFINITELY NOT WORTH A BUCK.
customer_reviews.author: $3 TIP FOR AMZ DELIVERIES TBA---

customer_reviews.title: PAID 27.64 ON AMAZON NOT WORTH $1. MADE EXTREMELY SMALL FOR ASIANS. NO ARCH FLAT.
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT made in the USA, but made in a country that has much smaller feet, CHINA. I ordered 13EEE but they fit like 12C. Has an very tight elastic strap that's under the vinyl adjustable strap, so the fake adjustable strap is worthless. No arch support, absolutely flat, painful. Doubt that they are true rubber soles as claimed, but likely EVA that will compress and go flat in no time. For the $27.64 (Amazon verifiable) that I paid for the pair, I have given them to charity. DEFINITELY NOT WORTH A BUCK.

product_meta.title: Propét Men's Viator Strap Sneaker, Black, 12 UK
product_meta.description: Breathable engineered mesh upper with mesh lining and wide adjustable strap closure, pu insole with gel heel pad and cushioning ridges, lightweight outsole with siped eva and rubber compound.
